isis.stitle: VT-365 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (2002) - ENGINE AND VEHICLE FEATURES - Standard Features - Change Oil Interval Message

svcproc.title: Change Oil Interval Message
svcproc.para: The change oil interval message can be programmed with the EST for mileage, hours, or amount of fuel used. The change oil message timer can be reset using the CRUISE ON and RESUME/ACCEL switches.

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, make sure the transmission is in neutral, parking brake is set, and wheels are blocked before doing any diagnostic or service procedures on engine or vehicle.

note.para: Do step 3 and 4 within 10 seconds of key ON.

step1.para: Press and release the CRUISE ON and RESUME/ACCEL switches at the same time (4 times within 6 seconds).
Press and hold both CRUISE ON and RESUME/ACCEL switches for 3 seconds.
Release both switches. The change oil interval message is reset.
